title: Lyfe Kitchen - Palo Alto
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Flagship location of this healthier eating concept restaurant, co-founded by former McDonald's restaurant executive with menu co-created by vegan chef Tal Ronen. Vegan choices in flatbreads, share ables, soups, salads, sandwiches, entrees, pizza, sides and desserts. Has a quinoa crunch wrap. Prices are inexpensive to moderate. Interior features a shelf of alive herb plants.
